ISSUE.TITLE: ShipStation plugin typo
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: the upcoming 4.30 ("develop" branch) Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to the configuration page 2. "Send dimensio" input should be named "Send dimensions". Or it's even better to name it "Pass dimensions" (for consistency) like it's done for other shipping plugins such as "UPS"

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4362 Added docker-compose file to use MySQL server

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4367 Renamed SendDimensio to PassDimensions (cherry picked from commit f341b6ef47f3b5521c59411bbbb9fd074b652e92)
#4367 Next changes on "Renamed SendDimensio to PassDimensions"
